Partners
As the mother’s partner, you can 
get involved in caring for your 
baby	from	day	one.	In	the	first	
weeks, you can:
• help your partner to 
breastfeed by:
 - spending time with her 
  while the baby is feeding; 
 - bringing your baby to your 
  partner when they need 
  feeding in the night; 
 - helping to wind your baby;
• change your baby’s nappies;
• bathe and dress your baby;
• cuddle and play with you
